Interface IScoreboardManager

public interface IScoreboardManager
Manager for the server's sidebar scoreboard system.

IScoreboardManager controls per-player sidebars with configurable templates (defined in scoreboard/config.yml) and optional PlaceholderAPI support. Scoreboards are updated asynchronously and applied on the main thread at a configurable tick rate.

Scoreboard types

  • MAIN — permanent lobby/main-world sidebar.
  • PRE_LOBBY — pre-event waiting room sidebar.
  • WAVE — per-wave event sidebar; requires a wave name.
  • HIDDEN — removes the sidebar entirely.

Typical usage

IScoreboardManager sb = ProudCoreAPI.get().getScoreboardManager();

// Show main scoreboard to a player
sb.setMainScoreboard(player);

// Show wave scoreboard
sb.setWaveScoreboard(player, "starter");

// Remove scoreboard
sb.removeScoreboard(player);
Since:
1.0

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    hasScoreboard(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
    Returns true if the player currently has an active sidebar managed by ProudCore.
    void
    reload()
    Reloads the scoreboard configuration from disk and refreshes all active scoreboards on the next update cycle.
    void
    removeScoreboard(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
    Removes the sidebar scoreboard from the player, restoring the server's default scoreboard.
    void
    setMainScoreboard(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
    Sets the player's sidebar to the MAIN template.
    void
    setPreLobbyScoreboard(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
    Sets the player's sidebar to the PRE_LOBBY template.
    void
    setWaveScoreboard(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, String waveName)
    Sets the player's sidebar to the WAVE template for the given wave.
    void
    shutdown()
    Shuts down the scoreboard manager: cancels all scheduled tasks and removes all active scoreboards.

  • Method Details

    • setMainScoreboard

      void setMainScoreboard(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Sets the player's sidebar to the MAIN template.
      Parameters:
      player - the target player; must not be null

    • setPreLobbyScoreboard

      void setPreLobbyScoreboard(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Sets the player's sidebar to the PRE_LOBBY template.
      Parameters:
      player - the target player; must not be null

    • setWaveScoreboard

      void setWaveScoreboard(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, String waveName)
      Sets the player's sidebar to the WAVE template for the given wave.

      If no scoreboard data is found for waveName, the sidebar is left unchanged and a warning is logged.

      Parameters:
      player - the target player; must not be null
      waveName - the wave identifier matching a key in scoreboard/config.yml; must not be null

    • removeScoreboard

      void removeScoreboard(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Removes the sidebar scoreboard from the player, restoring the server's default scoreboard.
      Parameters:
      player - the target player; must not be null

    • hasScoreboard

      boolean hasScoreboard(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Returns true if the player currently has an active sidebar managed by ProudCore.
      Parameters:
      player - the target player; must not be null
      Returns:
      true if a managed scoreboard is active for this player

    • reload

      void reload()
      Reloads the scoreboard configuration from disk and refreshes all active scoreboards on the next update cycle.

      Call this after any external modification to scoreboard/config.yml to pick up the changes without a server restart.

    • shutdown

      void shutdown()
      Shuts down the scoreboard manager: cancels all scheduled tasks and removes all active scoreboards.

      Internal use only. Called by ProudCore during onDisable().
